EmailTemplate.description: This email informs IST that their inactive dealer is now document compliant.
EmailTemplate.name: Compliant Dealer Is Inactive
EmailTemplate.subject: Dealer ID {!Account.Dealership_ID__c} Is Now Document Compliant
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Your dealer, {!Account.Name}, has turned in all required documents and is now compliant.
Salesforce account link: {!Account.Link}
